}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [https://downloadcenter.intel.com/SearchResult.aspx?lang=eng&ProductFamily=PC+Accessories&ProductLine=PortGear+USB+Hubs&ProductProduct=Xircom%C2%AE+PortGear+7+Port+Multifunction+USB+Hub+(PGFHUB04%2C+PGMHUB7%2C+HUB-4U2S1P)&ProdId=630&DownloadType=Drivers Downloads on '''Intel''''s site]
"200-0831-001" and "REV A" is etched onto some (if not all) PGMHUB7's boards. :A date code of '''0037''' is silkscreened onto one PGMHUB7's board.
===Probable included power supply(/ies)=== The power supply included with the device looks to be a '''YHi''' YC-1018-B05-U (P/N: 180-0005-037).
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = YHi |model = YC-1018-B05-U |revision = 180-0005-037 |input_v=100-120 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=3.7 |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical }}
